summary:
Now, the player can exchange their empty soul gems
for filled ones by paying a fee.
descriptionHtml:
Soul Gem Exchange
(Formerly Court Wizards Fill Soul Gems)

Soul trap might be great for mages, but what if
you are playing a thief or warrior? Now, the player
can exchange their empty soul gems for filled ones
by paying a fee. You can customize the fee you
are charged for the service in two ways:
1. a lesser power spell
2. the MCM menu

This mod was originally requested by Rhettly.

This mod requires:
Skyrim and the latest update

* You will need SkyUI if you want to
use the mod customization menu.

I hope you enjoy my mod.
author: MimiTheAlchemist

files.name: Court Wizards Fill Soul Gems - New Version
files.fileName: Court Wizards Fill Soul Gems - New Version-54730-2-0.zip
files.changelogHtml:
06/10/2014

Adds a lesser power spell that works as a
customization menu with two options.
* Turn Black Soul Gem filling On or Off
* Set Prices for soul gem filling.

files.name: Court Wizards Fill Soul Gems - New Version - now with MCM
files.changelogHtml:
06/10/2014
Adds a handy MCM menu for those of us
who use skyUI with the same options.
* Turn Black Soul Gem filling On or Off
* Set Prices for soul gem filling.

files.name: Soul Gem Exchange - Newest Version
files.changelogHtml:
06/24/2014
* Reworked the mod into a soul gem exchange
instead of a pay to fill service for a more
lore-friendly alternative.
* Added Sergius at the College of Winterhold to the
list of NPCs that will exchange soul gems
* Fixed issue with filling many soul gems.
* Combined the versions into one version.
